title: Is There a way to get small amounts of RP?
body: So I'm like around 30 RP short of Moo Cow Alistar and it feels bad because there isn't another skin I want to buy atm. Is there a way to get this small amount of RP without buying a regular amount?

replies.body:
Sine that's such a small amount of RP, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can see what we can do! 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
